tricks.name: Mute
tricks.description: The Mute is a snowboarding trick where the rider grabs the frontside edge of the board between the two feet with the front hand.

tricks.name: Indy
tricks.description: The Indy is a snowboarding trick where the rider grabs the frontside edge of the board, between the two feet, with the back hand.

tricks.name: Stalefish
tricks.description: The Stalefish is a snowboarding trick where the rider grabsthe backside edge of the board between the two feet with the back hand.

tricks.name: Japan (or Japan Air)
tricks.description: The Japan is a snowboarding trick where the rider grabs the front of the board, with the front hand, on the side of the frontside edge.

tricks.name: Seatbelt
tricks.description: The Seatbelt is a snowboarding trick where the rider grabs the frontside edge at the rear with the front hand; truck driver: gripping the front edge and back edge with each hand (like holding a steering wheel).

tricks.name: Nosegrab
tricks.description: The Nosegrab is a snowboarding trick where the rider grabs the front part of the board, with the front hand.

tricks.name: Tailgrab
tricks.description: The Tailgrab is a snowboarding trick where the rider grabs the back part of the board, with the back hand.
The 180 is a snowboarding trick where the rider rotates 180 degrees in the air.
The 360 is a snowboarding trick where the rider rotates 360 degrees in the air.
The 540 is a snowboarding trick where the rider rotates 540 degrees in the air.
The 720 is a snowboarding trick where the rider rotates 720 degrees in the air.
The 900 is a snowboarding trick where the rider rotates 900 degrees in the air.
The 1080 is a snowboarding trick where the rider rotates 1080 degrees in the air.
